verses.verse: Now it came to pass in the <S%H3117>days<s%> when the <S%H8199>judges<s%> <S%H8199>ruled<s%>, that there was a <S%H7458>famine<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>. And a certain <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H1035%H3063>Beth-lehem-judah<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, he, and his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H376>man<s%> was <S%H458>Elimelech<s%>, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5281>Naomi<s%>, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H4248>Mahlon<s%> and <S%H3630>Chilion<s%>, <S%H673>Ephrathites<s%> of <S%H1035%H3063>Beth-lehem-judah<s%>. And they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and continued there.
And <S%H458>Elimelech<s%> <S%H5281>Naomi's<s%> <S%H376>husband<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%>; and she was <S%H7604>left<s%>, and her <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>.

And they <S%H5375>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> of the <S%H802>women<s%> of <S%H4125>Moab<s%>; the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H259>one<s%> was <S%H6204>Orpah<s%>, and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H7327>Ruth<s%>: and they <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> there about <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

¶ Then she <S%H6965>arose<s%> with her daughters in <S%H3618>law<s%>, that she might <S%H7725>return<s%> from the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: for she had <S%H8085>heard<s%> in the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> how that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6485>visited<s%> his <S%H5971>people<s%> in <S%H5414>giving<s%> them <S%H3899>bread<s%>.

Wherefore she went <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4725>place<s%> where she was, and her <S%H8147>two<s%> daughters in <S%H3618>law<s%> with her; and they <S%H3212>went<s%> on the <S%H1870>way<s%> to <S%H7725>return<s%> unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

And <S%H5281>Naomi<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto her <S%H8147>two<s%> daughters in <S%H3618>law<s%>, <S%H3212>Go<s%>, <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H802>each<s%> to her <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>deal<s%> <S%H2617>kindly<s%> with you, as ye have <S%H6213>dealt<s%> with the <S%H4191>dead<s%>, and with me.

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>grant<s%> you that ye may <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H4496>rest<s%>, <S%H802>each<s%> of you in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of her <S%H376>husband<s%>. Then she <S%H5401>kissed<s%> them; and they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>.
And they <S%H559>said<s%> unto her, Surely we will <S%H7725>return<s%> with thee unto thy <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And <S%H5281>Naomi<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Turn <S%H7725>again<s%>, my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>: why will ye <S%H3212>go<s%> with me? are there yet any more <S%H1121>sons<s%> in my <S%H4578>womb<s%>, that they may be your <S%H582>husbands<s%>?

Turn <S%H7725>again<s%>, my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, <S%H3212>go<s%> your way; for I am too <S%H2204>old<s%> to have an <S%H376>husband<s%>. If I should <S%H559>say<s%>, I <S%H3426>have<s%> <S%H8615>hope<s%>, if I should have an <S%H376>husband<s%> also to <S%H3915>night<s%>, and should also <S%H3205>bear<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>;

Would ye <S%H7663>tarry<s%> for <S%H3860>them<s%> till they were <S%H1431>grown<s%>? would ye <S%H5702>stay<s%> for <S%H3860>them<s%> from having <S%H376>husbands<s%>? nay, my <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; for it <S%H4843>grieveth<s%> me <S%H3966>much<s%> for your sakes that the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is gone <S%H3318>out<s%> against me.

And they lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> their <S%H6963>voice<s%>, and wept <S%H1058>again<s%>: and <S%H6204>Orpah<s%> <S%H5401>kissed<s%> her mother in <S%H2545>law<s%>; but <S%H7327>Ruth<s%> <S%H1692>clave<s%> unto her.

And she <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold, thy sister in <S%H2994>law<s%> is gone <S%H7725>back<s%> unto her <S%H5971>people<s%>, and unto her <S%H430>gods<s%>: <S%H7725>return<s%> thou <S%H310>after<s%> thy sister in <S%H2994>law<s%>.

And <S%H7327>Ruth<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6293>Intreat<s%> me not to <S%H5800>leave<s%> thee, or to <S%H7725>return<s%> from following <S%H310>after<s%> thee: for whither thou <S%H3212>goest<s%>, I will <S%H3212>go<s%>; and where thou <S%H3885>lodgest<s%>, I will <S%H3885>lodge<s%>: thy <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and thy <S%H430>God<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>:

Where thou <S%H4191>diest<s%>, will I <S%H4191>die<s%>, and there will I be <S%H6912>buried<s%>: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> so to me, and <S%H3254>more<s%> also, if ought but <S%H4194>death<s%> <S%H6504>part<s%> thee and me.
When she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that she was stedfastly <S%H553>minded<s%> to <S%H3212>go<s%> with her, then she <S%H2308>left<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> unto her.

¶ So they <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> until they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>. So <S%H5281>Naomi<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%>, and <S%H7327>Ruth<s%> the <S%H4125>Moabitess<s%>, her daughter in <S%H3618>law<s%>, with her, which <S%H7725>returned<s%> out of the <S%H7704>country<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: and they <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%> in the <S%H8462>beginning<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.
